Problems in teaching programming

Jan 30, 2018 Softer Moscow, Russia

I teach software developers for more than 3 years at the time of the talk.

I had different experiences with universities, courses, and mentorship. I have tried to sum it all up.

Since, there are different problems in this field which are generally not covered at all.
